login.title: Welcome to Delphi!
login.text: To login, please click the button below, you'll get redirected to the login page of UGent CAS.

login_error.title: There was an error logging in!
login_error.text: To retry, please press the button below.

unauthorized.title: Access to this page is restricted!
unauthorized.text: Please check with an admin if you believe this is a mistake.
